dcterms:creator: J. E. Laird
K. Gluck
J. Anderson
K. D. Forbus
O. C. Jenkins
C. Lebiere
D. Salvucci
M. Scheutz
A. Thomaz
G. Trafton
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on how an agent learns an initial representation of a task from human instruction in natural interaction, emphasizing verbal communication and the role of tutors in providing feedback and guidance.
dcterms:title: Interactive Task Learning (ITL)

dcterms:creator: J. Bruner
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the concept of co-construction in learning, particularly in the context of adult-child interactions.
dcterms:title: Co-construction

dcterms:creator: D. Wood
J. S. Bruner
G. Ross
dcterms:description: A dataset that examines the role of tutoring in problem-solving, highlighting the importance of scaffolding in learning interactions.
dcterms:title: Scaffolding

dcterms:creator: K. J. Rohlfing
B. Wrede
A.-L. Vollmer
P.-Y. Oudeyer
dcterms:description: A dataset that proposes an alternative approach to mapping words onto concepts in language acquisition through the use of pragmatic frames.
dcterms:title: Pragmatic Frames

dcterms:creator: A. K. Philippsen
R. F. Reinhart
B. Wrede
P. Wagner
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates how hyperarticulation can aid in the learning of new vowels within a developmental speech acquisition model.
dcterms:title: Hyperarticulation

dcterms:creator: L. Schillingmann
B. Wrede
K. J. Rohlfing
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a computational model of acoustic packaging, which is used to enhance learning through multimodal communication.
dcterms:title: Acoustic Packaging

dcterms:creator: A. Saran
E. S. Short
A. Thomaz
S. Niekum
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores teacher gaze patterns and their implications for robot learning, particularly in structuring complex tasks into manageable sub-tasks.
dcterms:title: Teacher Gaze Patterns

dcterms:creator: A.-L. Vollmer
N. J. Hemion
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates robot skill learning without a predefined cost function, focusing on the optimization of dynamic movement primitives through naive user feedback.
dcterms:title: Robot Skill Learning
